title: can i know the reason why i got banned ???

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like we performed a security lock on your account due to suspicious activity.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can assist you with this!
there is an E-mail  that explains it , but the most bans are because of toxic
